mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Person (id, nickName, email, password, address, sex, age, personImage, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{address}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{personImage}, #{status});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM person WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM Person WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
select id,nickname,email from person where email=#{email}
select password from person where id=#{id} and email=#{email}
